analysis.description:
VestingAllocation.approveAllocation (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa74f89a6d4a918167c51132614bbbe193ee8c22.sol#614-621) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(allocationOf[_address].allocationState == Types.AllocationState.Proposed)

VestingAllocation.approveAllocation (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa74f89a6d4a918167c51132614bbbe193ee8c22.sol#614-621) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(allocationOf[_address].allocationState == Types.AllocationState.Proposed)
VestingAllocation.proposeAllocation (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa74f89a6d4a918167c51132614bbbe193ee8c22.sol#580-612) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(allocationOf[_dest].proposerAddress == 0x0 || allocationOf[_dest].allocationState == Types.AllocationState.Rejected)
	- require(bool)(allocationOf[_dest].proposerAddress == 0x0 || allocationOf[_dest].allocationState == Types.AllocationState.Rejected)

	- circulatingSupply (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa74f89a6d4a918167c51132614bbbe193ee8c22.sol#235)

VestingAllocation.proposeAllocation (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa74f89a6d4a918167c51132614bbbe193ee8c22.sol#580-612) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(allocationOf[_dest].proposerAddress == 0x0 || allocationOf[_dest].allocationState == Types.AllocationState.Rejected) (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa74f89a6d4a918167c51132614bbbe193ee8c22.sol#594-599)
	- allocationOf[_dest].allocationState != Types.AllocationState.Rejected (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa74f89a6d4a918167c51132614bbbe193ee8c22.sol#600-602)

VestingAllocation.approveAllocation (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa74f89a6d4a918167c51132614bbbe193ee8c22.sol#614-621) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(allocationOf[_address].proposerAddress != _approverAddress) (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa74f89a6d4a918167c51132614bbbe193ee8c22.sol#619-620)
	- require(bool)(allocationOf[_address].allocationState == Types.AllocationState.Proposed) (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa74f89a6d4a918167c51132614bbbe193ee8c22.sol#616-619)

ERC223Token.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa74f89a6d4a918167c51132614bbbe193ee8c22.sol#23)
ERC223Token.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa74f89a6d4a918167c51132614bbbe193ee8c22.sol#23-24)
ERC223Token.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa74f89a6d4a918167c51132614bbbe193ee8c22.sol#25-28)
